program: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 18000); x=contfrac(sqrt(61)); for (n=0, 20000, write("b010145.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 07 2009
xref: Cf. A010514 Decimal expansion. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 07 2009
